title: Amazing Views and Did I Mention Look and Lease Special
posting_body: This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 708 Sq.
Serenity at Larkspur apartment homes: an oasis of calm in a unique parkland setting.
Located in the heart of Marin County.
Take a glimpse at your new home at Serenity at Larkspur Apartment Homes.
Many of our homes come equipped with hardwood floors, granite counters*, balconies, and ample living room areas.
Work and play areas are scattered around the grounds of our pet-friendly community.
The saltwater swimming pool with sundeck, clubroom, and outdoor grill area are a good choice if you want to relax and unwind.

Carport, Microwave, Kitchen, Granite Countertops, Refrigerator, Freezer, Disposal, Carpet, Patio/Balcony, Linen Closet*, Dishwasher, Stainless Steel Appliances, Oven, Tub/Shower, Vaulted Ceiling*, Skylight*, Window Coverings, Cable Ready, Eat-in Kitchen, Range, Views*, Ceiling Fans*, Washer/Dryer - In Unit, Wi-Fi, Private Entrances, Walk-In Closets*, Dining Room, Tile Floors, High Speed Internet Access, Vinyl Flooring*, Heating

Playground, EV Charging, Covered Parking, View of the Bay and Mt. Tamalpais, Meadow, Business Center, Picnic Areas, Walking/Biking Trails, 2 Spas, Fitness Center, Recreation Room, Herb Garden, Pet-Friendly, High Speed Internet Access, Yoga Studio, Recycling, Wine Room, Tennis Court, Fitness Trail, 2 Pools (1 Heated), Courtesy Patrol, Outdoor Lounges, BBQ/Picnic Area, Social Room
Rents are subject to vary based on household size and AMI amounts.
